title: 10 best winter scarves to buy as the temperature drops
text:

Now that the weather is changing, if you're hoping to take the edge off of the winter chill - a good place to start, is investing in some decent winter gear.

A scarf will protect you against the elements and keep you nice and toasty whilst you're out and about.

With a range of different designs and colours available, there's a winter scarf out there to suit everyone's personal taste.

From comforting cashmere to chunky woolen knits, the material of your new scarf is imperative for the level of warmth you want.

Keep snug and stylish this winter with our top rated picks, available to buy now online and in high street stores - just in time for winter.

10 best winter scarves 2019

1. JW Anderson Cable Knit Scarf

Inspired by traditional Celtic, cable knit designs; this scarf is both warming and chic. It has a causal look, but the elegant texture allows you to wear the scarf with a variety of styles.

A wool, Alpaca and acrylic blend give the scarf a chunky texture sure to keep you warm this winter. The long length makes it easy for you to wrap yourself up in, whilst maintaining a chic look.

Price: £19.90, Uniqlo - buy here now

2. Pink And Khaki Brushed Scarf

If you want to compliment your outfit, but still want to keep warm during the chiller months of the year; this pink and khaki brushed scarf from Topshop, is a great option - it's nice and affordable too, which always helps.

The colours are nicely intertwined to give it a neutral, but autumnal appropriate palette, perfect to mix and match with your winter outfits.

Price: £20, Topshop - buy here now

3. Plaid Blanket Scarf

If you're looking for something a bit less colourful and more formal, a neutral plaid scarf is a good way to go.

The length of the scarf gives it versatility, wear it normally as a scarf or drape it over yourself shawl style for different occasions.

At £5.99, it's an offer hard to walk away from.

Price: £5.99, Amazon - buy here now

4. Knitted Nep Scarf with Wool

Step out snug and stylish with this knitted woolen scarf from Marks and Spencer.

The super soft wool material provides you with an extra layer of insulation to help keep the cold at bay. Nep yarns give the scarf flecks of colour for an understated chic style.

Price: £22.50, Marks and spencer - buy here now

5. Soufflé Knit Yarn Scarf

The soft ribbed fabric of this scarf from Uniqlo give you a lightweight but, cosy feel.

It's been designed to wrap around the neck twice; giving you a close, comforting fit that keeps your neck warm whatever the weather.

Price: £14.90, Uniqlo - buy here now

6. Oversized Tassel Scarf

An oversized scarf is an option to consider if you're desperate to ward off the neck chills. This one from Monki has a colourful, checkered design making it super stylish and a great winter accent for jazzing up your wardrobe.

If you want to incorporate some autumnal shades into your outfits and you love to keep warm, this is a great scarf. With a £20 price tag we're sure you'll love it that little bit more.

Price: £20, Monki - buy here now

7. ASOS DESIGN Long Woven Scarf with Raw Edge

Vamp up your winter wardrobe with this affordable scarf from ASOS, it'll give you a lovely pop of colour that will keep you looking chic throughout the colder times of the year.

The woven acrylic scarf has raw edges and is long enough to wrap yourself up in as many as you need.

Create a stylish, layered effect with your winter clothes and top it off with this dreamy scarf.

Price: £12, ASOS - buy here now

8. Brora Cashmere Speckle Scarf

This cashmere scarf from John Lewis has a price tag at the higher end of the scarf spectrum. It would however, make the perfect winter gift for someone you love, that enjoys life's little luxuries.

Made from 100% cashmere, not only will this speckled scarf keep you sumptuous and warm when you're out and about - it'll brighten up your seasonal wardrobe too.

Price: £109, John Lewis - buy here now

9. Pia Rossini - Black 'Grace' Faux Fur Scarf

This faux fur scarf from Pia Rossini, is a great option if you need to beat the chills and look elegant at the same time.

Add warmth to any outfit with this luxurious pick, winter style doesn't have to be boring - this scarf is proof.

Price: £42, Debenhams - buy here now

10. NovForth Winter Neck Warmer

If you cycle or have a heavy commute in winter, you'll want something that can keep you warm against the elements. Whilst offering weather protection, this neck warmer comes in a range of colours to compliment your style.

Made from a soft cotton fabric, this design maximises heat retention and can be pulled up to keep the lower part of your face warm as well.

If you're into winter activities like skiing, hiking or snowboarding the scarf is perfectly suited. Alternatively, if you're just walking the dog on a cold evening - it'll do for that too.

Price: £9.90, Amazon - buy here now
description: Along with a hat and a decent pair of gloves, a scarf is an essential item of clothing for the winter season ahead. These are some of the most stylish you can buy right now
